item.title: IODIDE
item.description:
DrugBank ID: db12754
DrugCentral: iodide
Synonymous :iodide ion


Drug Sentece Context


Table 1. Analysis of context sentence of iodide gene in 1 abstracts.

pmid sentence
1569770 A slurry containing 5 gm of talc and 3 gm of thymol iodide was instilled into the pleural space through the chest tube.
22759956 MTT assay, TUNEL staining, flow cytometry using propidium iodide and annexin V-FITC, real-time RT-PCR, Western blotting, and assay of caspase-3, -8, and -9 activities were carried out using malignant pleural mesothelioma cell lines such as NCI-H28, NCI-H2052, NCI-H2452, and MSTO-211H cells, and p53 or A(3) adenosine receptor was knocked-down by transfecting each siRNA into cells.
24094913 Cell death was determined by annexinV/propidium iodide staining and flow cytometry.
25586190 Flow cytometry analyses after staining cells with Annexin V and propiodium iodide corroborated LCA-mediated apoptotic cell death of MPM cells.
26004138 In the flow cytometry using propidium iodide (PI) and annexin V (AV), DAPE significantly increased the population of PI-positive and AV-negative cells, corresponding to primary necrosis, and that of PI-positive and AV-positive cells, corresponding to late apoptosis/secondary necrosis, in NCI-H28 cells.
26112407 MTT assay, TUNEL staining, flow cytometry using propidium iodide (PI) and annexin V (AV), enzymatic caspase assay, and nuclear staining using DAPI were carried out, and mitochondrial membrane potentials and intracellular distribution of apoptosis-inducing factor (AIF) were monitored in cells with and without the siRNA silencing the Bid-targeted gene.
29137310 The second way of estimating drug effects specifically on tumor cells employs multi parameter flow cytometry, measuring apoptosis with the propidium iodide / AnnexinV technique and, particularly for pemetrexed, possible effects on cell cycle progression in immunologically identified tumor cells.
30272283 In addition, cell cycle progression was analyzed by propidium iodide (PI) staining and flow cytometry, and curcuminâ€‘induced apoptosis was measured by Annexin V/PI double staining.
3288807 Flow cytometry was performed using a double labeling method, i.e., propidium iodide for DNA staining and keratin for labeling of epithelial cells.
